title: Verify API Test - Check 25 SMS to one number.
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends sms request
custom_steps:
WHEN
SMS request sent to same number 25 times within 24 hrs.

title: Verify API Test - Check status error for 25 Plus sms to one number.
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user send request with a valid phone number
custom_steps:
WHEN
BoxOffice User sends sms request to same number 26 times within 24 hrs.
custom_expected:
THEN
Verify status returns 400 bad request

title: Verify Test API - Invalid ApiKey
custom_steps:
WHEN
Invalid Api key is provided
custom_expected:
THEN
401 Unauthorized is returned with "message": "Invalid apiKey", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with missing ticketID value
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Invalid ticket ID is provided
custom_expected:
THEN
400 bad Request is returned with "message": "Invalid Ticket ID List", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with no authorization header
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
No - API header authorization/apiKey is provided
custom_expected:
THEN
401 Unauthorized is returned with "message": "Incorrect Authorization header", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with no account ID value
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user send an SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Account ID is not provided/missing
custom_expected:
THEN
Verify a 200 OK is returned

title: Verify API Test - with missing value for deliveryID
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends an SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
The payload body does not contain a delivery ID
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Invalid Delivery ID", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with missing value for UserName
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Request sent without a UserName
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Invalid Initiator User Name", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - Valid phone number
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice User sends sms request with valid PhoneNumber
BoxOffice user sends a request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Request sent with valid PhoneNumber
custom_expected:
THEN
200 OK is returned with id and Bit.ly url in the response body

title: Verify API Test - Phone number value missing
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a sms request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Request sent without the phone number
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Invalid Phone Number", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - Phone number with max (boundary value)
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
Extra digit provided in the phone number field
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Request had invalid inputs when sending message. Issue might be an invalid phone number.", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - Phone number with min (boundary value)
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a SMS request
custom_steps:
WHEN
min digit provided in the phone number field
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Request had invalid inputs when sending message.  Issue might be an invalid phone number.", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with an alphanumeric phone number
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a request
custom_steps:
WHEN
SMS request with invalid phone number (Alphanumeric) is sent
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Request had invalid inputs when sending message.  Issue might be an invalid phone number.", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with no pvClientID value
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends a request
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with  "message": "Invalid pvClientId", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - with no eventContext provided
custom_preconds:
Given
BoxOffice user sends an sms request
custom_steps:
WHEN
No event Context is provided
custom_expected:
THEN
400 Bad Request is returned with "message": "Invalid Event Context", in the response body

title: Verify API Test - Bit.ly link
custom_preconds:
Given
User has issue with retrieving their ticket.
custom_steps:
WHEN
BoxOffice user sends sms request
custom_expected:
THEN
The user receives a short link in the form of a bit.ly link as SMS

title: Verify API Test - Bit.ly log
custom_expected: Bit.ly response call successful in log validation

title: Verify API Test - Refresh Token every 60 Seconds
